video.title: She-Ra and the Princesses of Power
video.synopsis: Soldier Adora finds a magic sword -- and her identity as legendary hero She-Ra. She joins the Rebellion, but her best friend stays with the evil Horde.

episodes.synopsis: Sneaking out after a training mission, Horde soldier Adora finds an uncanny sword in the Whispering Woods. Princess Glimmer wants it for the Rebellion.
episodes.title: The Sword Part 1

episodes.synopsis: On the run from a monster, Adora, Glimmer and Bow stumble into an ancient First Ones ruin, while the Shadow Weaver orders Catra to bring Adora back.
episodes.title: The Sword Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Glimmer concocts a plan to introduce Adora to Bright Moon, but it all goes wrong. Adora flees into the woods, where she meets an old woman named Razz.
episodes.title: Razz

episodes.synopsis: Adora and her friends undertake a relief mission to the besieged kingdom of Plumeria. The Shadow Weaver still wants Catra to bring Adora back.
episodes.title: Flowers for She-Ra

episodes.synopsis: The squad heads for the water realm of Salineas, ruled by Princess Mermista, but first they need a ship. Catra sets sail with Force captain Scorpia.
episodes.title: The Sea Gate

episodes.synopsis: A recruitment trip to Dryl goes awry thanks to a virus that corrupts Princess Entrapta's robots. When Adora transforms, it infects She-Ra, too.
episodes.title: System Failure

episodes.synopsis: Glimmer takes Adora and Bow to the secret sorcerous realm of Mystacor for a vacation, but Adora's nightmares of Shadow Weaver persist.
episodes.title: In the Shadows of Mystacor

episodes.synopsis: It's time for the Princess Prom, hosted by Princess Frosta. Adora wants to recruit her, but friend troubles and unexpected guests get in the way.
episodes.title: Princess Prom

episodes.synopsis: With her friends and the sword held prisoner in the Fright Zone, Adora turns to the Princess Alliance for help on a dangerous rescue mission.
episodes.title: No Princess Left Behind

episodes.synopsis: Blaming themselves, the princesses question the Alliance. Meanwhile, Glimmer is hiding glitches from her mom, and Adora is worried about her training.
episodes.title: The Beacon

episodes.synopsis: Adora enters the First Ones citadel with Catra on her tail. Inside, they're caught in an illusion simulator that brings back painful memories.
episodes.title: Promise

episodes.synopsis: Swift Wind comes to Bright Moon, Entrapta decrypts the First Ones data crystal, and Light Hope tells Adora about the history of She-Ra and Etheria.
episodes.title: Light Hope

episodes.synopsis: Entrapta's plan to weaken the other runestones allows Catra and Scorpia to attack Bright Moon, but Adora and her friends are ready to fight back.
episodes.title: The Battle of Bright Moon

episodes.synopsis: The Horde's bots attack the Woods, but the princesses can't capture one intact. Though Glimmer struggles with leadership, Catra has no such problems.
episodes.title: The Frozen Forest

episodes.synopsis: Once they realize Entrapta is alive, Bow and Glimmer head to Dryl to rescue her. Light Hope sends Adora and Swift Wind to fix a First Ones installation.
episodes.title: Ties That Bind

episodes.synopsis: The squad heads to Alwyn, the Rebellion’s breadbasket: It’s been out of contact, and there are rumors it’s haunted! Entrapta sneaks into Hordak’s lab.
episodes.title: Signals

episodes.synopsis: Adora and the princesses role-play plans for retaking a Horde fortress. With Scorpia in charge, the defenders face a challenge.
episodes.title: Roll With It

episodes.synopsis: Catra, Entrapta and Scorpia head to the Northern Reach for First Ones tech. The squad follows with Sea Hawk, who’s having relationship problems.
episodes.title: White Out

episodes.synopsis: An imprisoned Shadow Weaver recalls her past as Light Spinner, a powerful sorcerer who taught Glimmer’s father. Hordak gives Catra a deadline.
episodes.title: Light Spinner

episodes.synopsis: While Catra searches for Shadow Weaver, Adora and Glimmer follow Bow home and learn that he's been lying to his family.
episodes.title: Reunion

episodes.synopsis: Shadow Weaver appears in Bright Moon, refusing to speak to anyone but Adora. As Catra awaits punishment, Entrapta pushes Hordak on the portal project.
episodes.title: The Price of Power

episodes.synopsis: The squad finds the Crimson Waste isn't uninhabited after all. Adora decides to trust Waste leader Huntara, and Hordak tells Entrapta about Horde Prime.
episodes.title: Huntara

episodes.synopsis: Catra and Scorpia arrive in the Waste and have no trouble fitting in. Huntara and the squad enter Mara's ship to try to view her message.
episodes.title: Once Upon a Time in the Waste

episodes.synopsis: Glimmer wants to make a raid on the Fright Zone, and her mother isn't willing to help ... but Shadow Weaver is. Adora tries to talk to Entrapta.
episodes.title: Moment of Truth

episodes.synopsis: Force captain Adora wakes up in the Fright Zone alongside her best friend Catra. She's convinced something's wrong, but only Scorpia seems to agree.
episodes.title: Remember

episodes.synopsis: King Micah and Queen Angella are shocked by Adora's story. With time to restore reality running out, Adora turns to Bow and Glimmer for help.
episodes.title: The Portal

episodes.synopsis: The day of Glimmer's coronation arrives, overshadowed by grief. Accompanied by Adora and Bow, she embarks on a quest to find the Chamber of Queens.
episodes.title: The Coronation

episodes.synopsis: Glimmer sends Adora, Perfuma, Bow and Huntara to retrieve Mara's ship, but the Horde beats them to it. Catra meets Double Trouble, a shapeshifter.
episodes.title: The Valley of the Lost

episodes.synopsis: The village of Elberon throws a party for Adora, Bow and Swift Wind. A village girl named Flutterina helps when the Horde springs another trap.
episodes.title: Flutterina

episodes.synopsis: The squad waylays a Horde transport, only to have the tables turn. While Adora hunts for a new pulse bot, Glimmer takes advice from Shadow Weaver.
episodes.title: Pulse

episodes.synopsis: A spore storm traps the Horde trainees in the Woods and traps Adora in the Crystal Castle, where a damaged Light Hope is forced to reboot herself.
episodes.title: Protocol

episodes.synopsis: Catra orders Scorpia to find Entrapta's recordings so Hordak can perfect his experimental technology. Flutterina sows dissent in the squad.
episodes.title: Princess Scorpia

episodes.synopsis: After a disastrous mission, Mermista is certain there's a Horde spy in Bright Moon and vows to sleuth them out with her mystery novel experience.
episodes.title: Mer-Mysteries

episodes.synopsis: With tensions rising between Glimmer and Adora and morale at an all-time low, Sea Hawk, Bow and Swift Wind go out for some fun. Things get out of hand.
episodes.title: Boys' Night Out

episodes.synopsis: Razz confuses the past and the present and has trouble telling Mara and Adora apart. But Adora desperately needs her help.
episodes.title: Hero

episodes.synopsis: The Princess Alliance is split on whether to use the magic at the Heart of Etheria or try to destroy it. Scorpia arrives with a request for help.
episodes.title: Fractures

episodes.synopsis: Adora, Bow and Swift Wind arrive on Beast Island and make a shocking discovery. Glimmer heads to the Crystal Castle to talk to Light Hope.
episodes.title: Beast Island

episodes.synopsis: Glimmer tries to convince Scorpia to reconnect with her runestone. On Beast Island, Entrapta reveals dire new details about the Heart of Etheria.
episodes.title: Destiny Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Catra and Hordak fight one another as Glimmer and Scorpia arrive in the Fright Zone. Adora sets off in a last-ditch attempt to stop Light Hope's plan.
episodes.title: Destiny Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Adora, Micah and the princesses search for a way to fight back and to rescue Glimmer. On Horde Prime's flagship, Catra schemes.
episodes.title: Horde Prime

episodes.synopsis: While Adora takes a much-needed rest, Mermista reluctantly leads the princesses into the Fright Zone so Entrapta can try to trace Horde Prime's signal.
episodes.title: Launch

episodes.synopsis: As Bow, Entrapta and Adora attempt to keep Mara's ship functional, Horde Prime orders Catra to betray Glimmer – under threat of a memory wipe.
episodes.title: Corridors

episodes.synopsis: Forced to land on a desolate planet to replenish the ship's fuel crystals, Adora meets three siblings on the run from Horde Prime.
episodes.title: Stranded

episodes.synopsis: Adora surrenders herself to Horde Prime, hoping to buy time for Entrapta, Bow and Glimmer to rescue Catra and hack Horde Prime's server.
episodes.title: Save the Cat

episodes.synopsis: The team tries to keep the ship working and evade Horde Prime's pursuit. On Etheria, Micah struggles to relate to Frosta during a mission to Elberon.
episodes.title: Taking Control

episodes.synopsis: Mermista, Scorpia, Perfuma and Sea Hawk go undercover underwater to recruit Prince Peekablue. Netossa notices that Spinnerella is acting strange.
episodes.title: Perils of Peekablue

episodes.synopsis: The squad heads to the planet Krytis to find a way to get past Horde Prime's blockade on Etheria. Shadow Weaver appeals to Castaspella for help.
episodes.title: Shot in the Dark

episodes.synopsis: While Wrong Hordak's message of dissent spreads throughout the empire, the squad infiltrates the town of Erelandia to get a lead on their friends.
episodes.title: An Ill Wind

episodes.synopsis: Adora, Catra, Perfuma and Netossa reenter the Fright Zone to rescue Scorpia while Bow and Glimmer head to the library to check on Bow's dads.
episodes.title: Return to the Fright Zone

episodes.synopsis: A strike team infiltrates Mystacor, searching for the Heart's failsafe, the Crystal of Arxia. Entrapta and Swift Wind gather data on the chip network.
episodes.title: Failsafe

episodes.synopsis: The best friend squad heads for the Heart while the princesses attack the spire so Entrapta can disrupt the chip network. Horde Prime makes his move.
episodes.title: Heart Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Shadow Weaver and Catra attempt to reach Adora. Glimmer faces her father while Bow tries to evade Scorpia long enough to execute Entrapta's program.
episodes.title: Heart Part 2
